nodes.text: A Human female mercenary was a non-Force-sensitive member of the Brotherhood of Darkness. She fled from the Seventh Battle of Ruusan after the Army of Light managed to break through the Brotherhood's defenses, and returned to the Sith camp. While scavenging treasures and supplies, she and a group of other mercenaries was attacked by Darth Bane.
The female mercenary was killed when Bane used his power over the The Force to break her neck.
